title.narrative: WP4 Climate and Climate Change

description.narrative: Making available Climate Services to stakeholders promote Climate Field Schools and Climate Atlas support BMKG as RCC for WMO RA V

Within this work package three different activities all relating to climate and climate change are combined. The scope and aim of these activities varies. These activities are 1) the further development of the Climate Field Schools and the Climate Change Atlas 2) the transition to Climate Services that are more end/user oriented and 3) the further development of capabilities of BMKG to act as the Regional Climate Center for WMO RA V.
